snippet: Gotham Extra: Neighbors opposed to building a soccer stadium in the park seem to have the support of the United States Tennis Association, which also wants a piece of the park.
abstract: Gotham Extra: Neighbors opposed to building a soccer stadium in the park seem to have the support of the United States Tennis Association, which also wants a piece of the park.

headline.main: For Protectors of Flushing Meadows-Corona Park, an Unlikely Ally
